option.name: originalContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.RadioButton?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?> <?import javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="920.0" prefWidth="1200.0" style="-fx-background-color: linear-gradient(to bottom, #3a506b 0%, #5bc0be 100%);" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.smartmedicalinventory.controller.Register_page_controller"> <fx:define> <ToggleGroup fx:id="userTypeGroup" /> <ToggleGroup fx:id="orgTypeGroup" /> </fx:define> <children> <Button layoutX="30.0" layoutY="30.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#backmethod" prefHeight="40.0" prefWidth="40.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 20; -fx-background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); -fx-effect: dropshadow(gaussian, rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 5, 0, 0, 2);"> <graphic> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 24px; -fx-fill: #3a506b;" text="←" /> </graphic> </Button> <VBox alignment="CENTER" layoutX="142.0" layoutY="50.0" prefHeight="820.0" prefWidth="903.0" spacing="25.0" style="-fx-background-color: #ffffffee; -fx-background-radius: 24; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.08), 20, 0.5, 0, 8); -fx-padding: 40;" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="142.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="155.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="50.0"> <children> <Text fill="#3a506b" style="-fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Registration"> <font> <Font size="43.0" /> </font> </Text> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="20.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 18px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Register as:" /> <RadioButton fx:id="customerRadio" style="-fx-text-fill: #5bc0be;" text="Customer"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> <toggleGroup> <ToggleGroup fx:id="userTypeGroup" /> </toggleGroup> </RadioButton> <RadioButton fx:id="organizationRadio" style="-fx-text-fill: #5bc0be;" text="Organization" toggleGroup="$userTypeGroup"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </RadioButton> </HBox> <HBox spacing="30.0"> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Name:" /> <TextField fx:id="nameField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Name" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Age:" /> <TextField fx:id="ageField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="100" promptText="Age" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Email:" /> <TextField fx:id="emailField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Email" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> </HBox> <HBox spacing="30.0"> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Contact:" /> <TextField fx:id="contactField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Contact" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10.0" /> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Password:" /> <TextField fx:id="passwordField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Password" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> </HBox> <Text fill="#5bc0be" style="-fx-font-size: 20px; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Only for Organization" /> <HBox spacing="30.0"> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Organization Name:" /> <TextField fx:id="orgNameField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Organization name" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Type:" /> <HBox minHeight="36.0" spacing="10.0"> <RadioButton fx:id="pharmacyRadio" minHeight="36.0" minWidth="36.0" prefHeight="22.0" prefWidth="136.0" style="-fx-text-fill: #3a506b;" text="Pharmacy"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> <toggleGroup> <ToggleGroup fx:id="orgTypeGroup" /> </toggleGroup> </RadioButton> <RadioButton fx:id="hospitalRadio" minHeight="36.0" prefHeight="22.0" prefWidth="113.0" style="-fx-text-fill: #3a506b;" text="Hospital" toggleGroup="$orgTypeGroup"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </RadioButton> <RadioButton fx:id="othersRadio" minHeight="36.0" prefHeight="22.0" prefWidth="94.0" style="-fx-text-fill: #3a506b;" text="Others" toggleGroup="$orgTypeGroup"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </RadioButton> </HBox> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Address:" /> <TextField fx:id="addressField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Address" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> </HBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="20.0"> <Button layoutX="0.0" layoutY="0.0" mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="50.0" prefWidth="160.0" style="-fx-background-color: linear-gradient(to right, #3a506b, #5bc0be); -fx-background-radius: 25; -fx-font-weight: bold; -fx-effect: dropshadow(gaussian, rgba(0,0,0,0.08), 8, 0, 0, 4);" text="Register" textFill="WHITE"> <font> <Font size="19.0" /> </font> </Button> </HBox> </children> </VBox> </children> </AnchorPane>

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<?import javafx.scene.control.Button?> <?import javafx.scene.control.RadioButton?> <?import javafx.scene.control.TextField?> <?import javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.AnchorPane?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.HBox?> <?import javafx.scene.layout.VBox?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Font?> <?import javafx.scene.text.Text?>
<AnchorPane prefHeight="920.0" prefWidth="1200.0" style="-fx-background-color: linear-gradient(to bottom, #3a506b 0%, #5bc0be 100%);" xmlns="http://javafx.com/javafx/24.0.1" xmlns:fx="http://javafx.com/fxml/1" fx:controller="com.example.smartmedicalinventory.controller.Register_page_controller"> <fx:define> <ToggleGroup fx:id="userTypeGroup" /> <ToggleGroup fx:id="orgTypeGroup" /> </fx:define> <children> <Button layoutX="30.0" layoutY="30.0" mnemonicParsing="false" onAction="#backmethod" prefHeight="40.0" prefWidth="40.0" style="-fx-background-radius: 20; -fx-background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9); -fx-effect: dropshadow(gaussian, rgba(0,0,0,0.2), 5, 0, 0, 2);"> <graphic> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 24px; -fx-fill: #3a506b;" text="←" /> </graphic> </Button> <VBox alignment="CENTER" layoutX="142.0" layoutY="50.0" prefHeight="820.0" prefWidth="903.0" spacing="25.0" style="-fx-background-color: #ffffffee; -fx-background-radius: 24; -fx-effect: dropshadow(three-pass-box, rgba(0,0,0,0.08), 20, 0.5, 0, 8); -fx-padding: 40;" AnchorPane.leftAnchor="142.0" AnchorPane.rightAnchor="155.0" AnchorPane.topAnchor="50.0"> <children> <Text fill="#3a506b" style="-fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Registration"> <font> <Font size="43.0" /> </font> </Text> <HBox alignment="CENTER_LEFT" spacing="20.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 18px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Name:" /> <TextField fx:id="nameField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Name" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Age:" /> <TextField fx:id="ageField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="100" promptText="Age" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Email:" /> <TextField fx:id="emailField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Email" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> </HBox> <HBox spacing="30.0"> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Contact:" /> <TextField fx:id="contactField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Contact" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10.0" /> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Password:" /> <TextField fx:id="passwordField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Password" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> </HBox> <Text fill="#5bc0be" style="-fx-font-size: 20px; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Only for Organization" /> <HBox spacing="30.0"> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Organization Name:" /> <TextField fx:id="orgNameField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Organization name" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Type:" /> <HBox minHeight="36.0" spacing="10.0"> <RadioButton fx:id="pharmacyRadio" minHeight="36.0" minWidth="36.0" prefHeight="22.0" prefWidth="136.0" style="-fx-text-fill: #3a506b;" text="Pharmacy"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> <toggleGroup> <ToggleGroup fx:id="orgTypeGroup" /> </toggleGroup> </RadioButton> <RadioButton fx:id="hospitalRadio" minHeight="36.0" prefHeight="22.0" prefWidth="113.0" style="-fx-text-fill: #3a506b;" text="Hospital" toggleGroup="$orgTypeGroup"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </RadioButton> <RadioButton fx:id="othersRadio" minHeight="36.0" prefHeight="22.0" prefWidth="94.0" style="-fx-text-fill: #3a506b;" text="Others" toggleGroup="$orgTypeGroup"> <font> <Font size="16.0" /> </font> </RadioButton> </HBox> </VBox> <VBox spacing="10.0"> <Text style="-fx-font-size: 16px; -fx-fill: #333; -fx-font-weight: bold;" text="Address:" /> <TextField fx:id="addressField" prefHeight="36.0" prefWidth="220" promptText="Address" style="-fx-background-radius: 12; -fx-border-color: #3a506b; -fx-border-radius: 12; -fx-border-width: 2;" /> </VBox> </HBox> <HBox alignment="CENTER" spacing="20.0"> <Button layoutX="0.0" layoutY="0.0" mnemonicParsing="false" prefHeight="50.0" prefWidth="160.0" style="-fx-background-color: linear-gradient(to right, #3a506b, #5bc0be); -fx-background-radius: 25; -fx-font-weight: bold; -fx-effect: dropshadow(gaussian, rgba(0,0,0,0.08), 8, 0, 0, 4);" text="Register" textFill="WHITE" onAction="#registermethod"> <font> <Font size="19.0" /> </font> </Button> </HBox> </children> </VBox> </children> </AnchorPane>
